articles.description: Working from home all day every day means more time in virtual meetings. We've all felt 'zoom fatigue', here's you can deal with it.

articles.title: Spectacular 'meteor shower' over SA was actually a 'bolide' - Independent Online
articles.description: What many South Africans thought was a spectacular meteor shower early on Tuesday evening was actually a “bolide”, a very bright meteor that often explodes on entry into the Earth’s atmosphere and can be seen over a wide expanse.
articles.content:
Cape Town If a small asteroid or large meteoroid survives its fiery passage through the Earth's atmosphere and lands on its surface, it is then called a meteorite, scientists say.
